ISSUE.TITLE: Price editing issue with "bulk edit"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: After upgrading to nopcommerce 4.80.4, the product editing enhancement "Bulk editing of product variants" is included, but it does not work in languages ​​other than English. If I switch to my own language set and choose to edit the price or quantity in stock, an error appears: ``` An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. FormatException: The input string '' was not in a correct format. System.Number.ThrowFormatException<TChar>(ReadOnlySpan<TChar> value) ``` Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/101928/bulk-editing-of-product-variants
